summary: The customer was looking to upgrade their wireless services and the agent was able to provide information on Contoso Wireless' three different unlimited data plans, which range from $39.99 to $79.99 per month. The agent also explained that exceeding the data limit will result in additional charges and that all plans include access to the nationwide network, free international calling to select countries, and 24/7 customer support. Lastly, the agent suggested that the customer check to make sure their area is covered by Contoso Wireless' service before signing up for a plan.
